## Packages

```{r}
library(readr)


```


## Data Import

```{r}
claims <- read_csv("claims.csv")
claims

```


## Data Cleaning

```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

claims_clean <- claims %>%
  filter(
    STATUS1 == "BILLED",
    STATUS2 == "BILLED" | is.na(STATUS2),
    STATUSP == "BILLED"
  ) %>%
mutate(
    BILLED_STATUS = paste(STATUS1, STATUS2, STATUSP, sep = "-")
  )

```

## Data Exploration

```{r}

ggplot() +
 aes(x = DEPARTMENTID) +
 geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#CC33CC") +
 theme_minimal()

```
